name: V-Bucks
description:
V-Bucks Quiz is a quiz game that is consistently updated with tons of questions about the game, Fortnite! You can also win V-BUCKS by submitting your own questions into the game and maybe get yourself a new dance emote or skin!

Share your score with your friends and find out who knows Fortnite the best!

Share your score on social media, compete against friends, and take the reign of the leaderboard!
